issue.title: building from source error in under Ubuntu 12.04

content.raw:
I think this is a bug in the debian packaging, not a bug in gazebo.  playerc++.pc explicitly requires on playerwkb.pc, playerinterface.pc, and playerc.pc.  When one of them is missing, the pkg-config call to libplayerc++ fails.  I think installing playerc++-dev should pull in those other three -dev packages to satisfy the pkgconfig requirements (and the build-time requirements).  

The fix in pull request #953 won't hurt anything, but it shouldn't be necessary.
